tool_description:
Convert HTML to PDF with one API request. 
Starts from $9.59/month. 
50 generations/month are free.

https://pdocf.com
name: HTML to PDF API
title: HTML to PDF API

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to convert HTML to PDF. See properties description in the model with examples.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-pdf-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
